name: Bouncing Hero
description:
With the knight riding pogo stick and your amazing control, explore the castle packed with highly sophisticated traps!

The thirteen-story high castle covered by magical power, changes its rooms randomly every time when you enter them. Statues with dead man's spirit are also ready to threaten you in this spooky castle. Who will be the one to conquer this tower? Enjoy the extreme auto-jumping platformer!
